channel.title: [Help] Items disappear on the ground when dropped
channel.description:
Title says all.
I downloaded this Client and source from moparscape server downloads.
Every time i drop something it disappear on the ground. And i need help with that. If you need skype or like send files from client or source id be glad to thanks.
